news.title: Apple has its best week since July 2020 after White House visit
news.summary: Apple is the third-most valuable company, behind Microsoft and Nvidia and ahead of Google and Amazon. Apple is also the most profitable company in the world.

news.title: How one real estate startup is taking on record heat this summer
news.summary: Runwise combines future weather algorithms with a wireless temperature sensor network that speaks to a central control system. Runwise will be available in the U.S. later this year.

news.title: The new American shopping mall is less Macy's, more church, bowling, Barnes & Noble
news.summary: Macy's and Sears close, and Claire's declares bankruptcy. New success is arriving from businesses that lead to retail "cross-shopping"

news.title: Activist Carronade spots a hidden gem in Viasat’s business. How the firm may unlock value
news.summary: Activist investor calls Viasat's Defense and Advanced Technologies business a 'crown jewel' that may be due for a spinoff or IPO.

news.title: Intel CEO responds to 'misinformation' and Trump threat in letter to employees
news.summary: Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan addressed "misinformation" about his previous roles on Thursday. President Donald Trump called for Tan's resignation on Wednesday.

news.title: ‘I’m tired of corporate America’: My wife and I have $1.65 million. I’m 61. Can I retire already?
news.summary: “My annual income is $108,000,” she says. “I’m not rich, but I’ve got a good life.”

news.title: Amazon documentary exposes ‘neglect and pain’ in many nursing homes. It’s only going to get worse.
news.summary: The filmmaker’s mom suffered from chemical restraints, infections and dehydration. Here's how you can protect your family members. The filmmaker's mom was in a medically-induced coma for more than a week.

news.title: ‘Things are getting tougher’: I’m struggling with $145,000 in debt. Should I refinance my 3.5% mortgage?
news.summary: “I’m in my upper 40s and have $300,000 in my 401(k),” he says. “I'm in my mid-40s. I’ve got a 401(K) that’s worth $300k.”

news.title: Trump wants private assets in 401(k)s. How do everyday investors value them?
news.summary: Private assets might soon be on the menu for your workplace retirement plan. But remember: These investments don't come with a price tag you can check every day.

news.title: ‘This scam stuff is going to get worse’: A man approached me in my car — he had a crazy story
news.summary: “I got rid of him by asking for a business card and a company name, and he bugged out,” she says.
